text:
="preserve">Krisztián Veréb (26 July 1977 – 24 October 2020) was a Hungarian sprint canoer. He competed in the late 1990s and early 2000s. He won a bronze medal in the K-2 1000 m event at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney.
Veréb died in a motorcycle accident on 24 October 2020 in Budapest. He was 43.
